text: We think this would have to do with the fact that multilanguage blogs are in beta... <@U7SL518D6> can you confirm? Thanks!

yes! you can use <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-to-manage-multi-language-content-with-HubSpots-cos|the multi-language feature> in HubSpot with different country-code TLDs like .nl and .com. That feature in HubSpot will take care of the `hreflang alternate` tags you need for this setup.
